entry.title: New release for Scraparr: v2.1.2 Fix
entry.content:

Full Changelog: https://github.com/thecfu/scraparr/compare/v2.1.0...v2.1.2

entry.title: New release for Scraparr: v2.2 Release
entry.content:
ğŸš€ Scraparr v2.2.0 Release

Weâ€™re excited to announce the release of Scraparr v2.2.0!
This update brings new service integrations, enhanced error tracking, and more flexible configuration options.

âœ¨ Summary Highlights

  • ğŸ“½ï¸ Added support for Whisparr (adult movie collection manager)
  • ğŸ¬ Added Jellyfin scraping support
  • âš™ï¸ Introduced configuration via environment variables
  • ğŸ› ï¸ Improved error logging with API URL visibility
  • ğŸ§¹ Centralized constants for cleaner code
  • ğŸ› Fixed incorrect Seerr metrics

ğŸ‰ New Features

  • Whisparr Integration
    Monitor your adult movie collection using Scraparr with full Whisparr support.

  • Jellyfin Scraping
    Scraparr can now scrape and monitor data from your Jellyfin media server.

  • Environment Variable Configuration
    Scraparr can now be configured easily through environment variables, making deployments even easier â€” especially for Docker setups!

ğŸ”§ Maintenance

  • Improved error logging: API URLs are now shown in request error logs for easier debugging.
  • Centralized constant values for a cleaner and more maintainable codebase.
  • Fixed incorrect usage of Seerr metrics.

ğŸ™Œ New Contributors

  • @mrgionsi made their first contribution with Jellyfin scraping! ğŸ‰
  • @Vibpositive made their first contribution by adding environment variable support! ğŸ‰

A big thank you to our new contributors for helping make Scraparr better!

ğŸ”„ What's Changed

  • Fix usage of wrong Seerr metrics by @TheGameProfi in [#91](https://github.com/TheCfU/Scraparr/pull/91)
  • Add API-Url to request error logging by @TheGameProfi in [#93](https://github.com/TheCfU/Scraparr/pull/93)
  • Add support for Whisparr by @TheGameProfi in [#94](https://github.com/TheCfU/Scraparr/pull/94)
  • Add Jellyfin scraping by @mrgionsi and @TheGameProfi in [#95](https://github.com/TheCfU/Scraparr/pull/95)
  • Add configuration from env vars by @Vibpositive in [#96](https://github.com/TheCfU/Scraparr/pull/96)
  • Add Jellyfin to env support + centralized constants by @TheGameProfi in [#98](https://github.com/TheCfU/Scraparr/pull/98)

ğŸ“œ Full Changelog: Compare v2.1.2 â†’ v2.2.0

ğŸ‘‰ GitHub Repository

entry.title: New release for Scraparr: v2.2.1 Fix
entry.content:
ğŸ› ï¸ Scraparr v2.2.1 Patch Release

This is a small patch release to ensure functionality when using environment variables.

ğŸ› Bug Fixes

  • Fix environment variable parsing
    Scraparr now correctly parses integer environment variables to prevent crashes during startup.

ğŸ”„ What's Changed

  • Fix: Parse env int values to int to prevent crash by @TheGameProfi in #103

ğŸ“œ Full Changelog: Compare v2.2.0 â†’ v2.2.1

entry.title: New release for Scraparr: v2.2.2 Fix
entry.content:
ğŸ› ï¸ Scraparr v2.2.2 Patch Release

This patch fixes a critical bug affecting multiple instances where metrics for the second instance could be reset, causing incorrect or incomplete data.

âš ï¸ Important

This release fixes a breaking bug that caused metrics of second instances to be reset, which could lead to loss of monitoring data or incomplete metrics for users running multiple instances.

ğŸ› Bug Fixes

  • Fix clearing logic Reworked clear logic to prevent resetting metrics of a second instance.

ğŸ”„ What's Changed

  • fix: rework clear logic to prevent clearing of a second instance in #106

ğŸ“œ Full Changelog: Compare v2.2.1 â†’ v2.2.2 ğŸ‘‰ GitHub Repository
